headline: VeriSign, Inc. (VRSN): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on VeriSign, Inc. (VRSN) on Incremental Returns’ Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on VRSN. VeriSign, Inc. (VRSN)’s share was trading at $275.56 as of 2nd June. VRSN’s trailing and forward P/E were 33.69 and 31.25 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
